dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.TRANSLOADER LOCATION CODE' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('XL2147T','XL2347T','COASTAL','SALMVIT') AND sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') trans_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('YSB','YC') AND sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') ysb_yc_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('SRWW','HRWW','SWW','DNSW') AND sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') wheat_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('SRWW','HRWW','SWW','DNSW','BLY') AND sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') wheat_bly_exists FROM DUAL

SELECT DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%AFLATOXIN%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%AFLATOXIN%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') afla_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%PROTEIN%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%PROTEIN%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') protein_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%OIL%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%OIL%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') oil_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%VOMITOXIN%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%VOMITOXIN%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') vomo_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%FALLING NUMBER%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%FALLING NUMBER%' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') fall_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('SRWW','HRWW','SWW','DNSW','YSB','YC','NS','HWW','BLY') AND sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') commodity_exists FROM DUAL

SELECT SHIP_GROUP_GID, SHIP_GROUP_XID, TRANSLOADER, FGIS_REQUIRED, LOC_CODE, ORIG_CONTACT, TRANS_CONTACT, SPEC_CONTACT, ADDITIONAL_NOTES FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE (GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER(:SHIP_GROUP_ID)))

SELECT SHIP_GROUP_GID, SHIP_GROUP_XID, CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID, CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID, SHIPMENT_GID, SHIPMENT_XID, TRANSLOADER_BOOKING, CONTAINER_DESC, COMMODITY_CODE, LOAD_PORT, DISCHARGE_PORT, CUTOFF_DATE, SAIL_DATE, BOOKING_NUMBER, SHIP_LINE, VESSEL, PICKUP_LOCATION, DROPOFF_LOCATION, EARLIEST_PICKUP_DATE, EARLIEST_DROPOFF_DATE FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_SHIPMENT(:SHIP_GROUP_ID)))

SELECT DISTINCT obr.ob_refnum_value FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON (s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL) INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON oob.order_base_gid = ssul.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON obr.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.EQUIPMENT_CONSTRAINT_TEXT' WHERE sg.ship_group_gid = :SHIP_GROUP_ID
SELECT remark_text AS DOCUMENT_DESC FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_DOCS_REQ(:SHIP_GROUP_ID)))
SELECT ship_group_gid, specification_desc, specification_value FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_SPECS(:SHIP_GROUP_ID)))
SELECT ship_group_gid, ship_group_xid, lab_gid, lab_name, full_address, phone, sample_size FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_LABS(:SHIP_GROUP_ID)))
SELECT COUNT(*) Image_Total FROM document doc, document_content doc_con WHERE doc.document_gid = doc_con.document_content_gid AND document_gid LIKE :SHIP_GROUP_ID || '_LAB%'
SELECT blob_content image1 FROM document doc, document_content doc_con WHERE doc.document_gid = doc_con.document_content_gid AND document_gid LIKE :SHIP_GROUP_ID || '_LAB%'
